name: War Of Spells
description: Wizard world suffers from endless fights of warring factions. Join one of them and end this showdown. Equip with magical wands, learn powerful spells and take part in magic combats. Reach the highest rank of a magic fighter!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer (only 64 bit) Processor: 1GHz CPU
